info.title: AEVIS Staff/Doctor Base API
info.description:
This is AEVIS backend server for **Doctor Base** and **Staff Base** mobile apps.

You can find out more about on Confluence in the following spaces: [Staff Base](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/Lr07PfRx) or [Doctor Base]https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/PmujY3mi).

Infrastructure information:
- [DEVELOPMENT](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/E6npyT1Z)
- [PREPRODUCTION](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/oRB9MQPN)
- [PRODUCTION](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/Bx7uz0Bf).

Tests users:
- [PREPRODUCTION](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/H145gmGg)
- [PRODUCTION](https://openwt.atlassian.net/l/c/fBcZV6mD).

Click the *Auhtorize* ðŸ”“ button and choose between the 2 authentication modes:
- **Static Bearer JWT**: Provide your valid JWT that you got from Keycloak in the `value` field.
- **Request Bearer JWT**: Provide account credentials (`username` and `password`), `client_id` and `client_secret` to request a new JWT to Keycloak.

Static Bearer JWT.description: Provide your own JWT and put it into the `value` field.(Simulator token: dCYBnw-xXryum-vkn6xr-BtLgFR)

Request Bearer JWT - PRE-PRODUCTION.description: Request token to Fluance Keycloak (PRE-PRODUCTION) `client_id` = openweb-doctor-app | openweb-employee-app

Request Bearer JWT - PRODUCTION.description: Request token to Fluance Keycloak (PRODUCTION) `client_id` = openweb-doctor-app | openweb-employee-app
